member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether npm should fetch remote resources even if a local copy exists on disk.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the package should be installed globally rather than locally.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether npm should ignore modules listed in devDependencies.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether npm should prevent optional dependencies from being installed (the --no-optional argument)

member.summary: Gets the list of packages which should be installed.

member.name: P:Cake.Npm.Install.NpmInstallSettings.Registry
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating which registry we should point to. Defaulted to whatever the NPM configuration is.

member.name: P:Cake.Npm.Install.NpmInstallSettings.PreferOffline
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to utilise the prefer offline flag, avoiding going to the internet for packages if possible.
